verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Hew|strong="H6458"\w* thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* like unto the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*: and I will \w write|strong="H3789"\w* upon \add these\add* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that were in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w*, which thou \w brakest|strong="H7665"\w*.

And be \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, and \w present|strong="H5324"\w* thyself there to me in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with thee, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* let any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* throughout all the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*; neither let the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* nor \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w before|strong="H4136"\w* that \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

¶ And he \w hewed|strong="H6458"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* like unto the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* in the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* with him there, and \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w* before \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* and \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, \w longsuffering|strong="H0750"\w*, and \w abundant|strong="H7227"\w* in \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*,

\w Keeping|strong="H5341"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* for \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w forgiving|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* and \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* and \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and that will by no \w means|strong="H5352"\w* \w clear|strong="H5352"\w* \add the guilty;\add* \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and upon the \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* children, unto the \w third|strong="H8029"\w* and to the \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \add generation\add*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* made \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, and bowed his \w head|strong="H6915"\w* toward the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If now I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, let my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, I pray thee, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us; for it \add is\add* a \w stiffnecked|strong="H7186"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* our \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* and our \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and take us for thine \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: before all thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w marvels|strong="H6381"\w*, such as have not been \w done|strong="H1254"\w* in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, nor in any \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* which thou \add art\add* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for it \add is\add* a terrible \w thing|strong="H3372"\w* that I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with thee.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* thou that which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: behold, I drive \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Perizzite|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*.

Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself, lest thou \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w*, lest it be for a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee:

But ye shall \w destroy|strong="H5422"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w break|strong="H7665"\w* their \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* their \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*:\f + \fr 34.13 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*

For thou shalt \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* no \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* \w Jealous|strong="H7067"\w*, \add is\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*:

Lest thou \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and they go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \add one\add* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee, and thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of his \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*;

And thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w make|strong="H2181"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.
Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee no \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ The \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* shalt thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*. \w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, as I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, in the \w time|strong="H4150"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w*: for in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w* thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

All that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w matrix|strong="H7358"\w* \add is\add* mine; and every \w firstling|strong="H6363"\w* among thy \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, \add whether\add* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* or \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \add  \+w that is male|strong="H2142"\+w*\add*.\f + \fr 34.19 \ft sheep: or, kid\f*

But the \w firstling|strong="H6363"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* with a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*: and if thou \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \add him\add* not, then shalt thou break his \w neck|strong="H6202"\w*. All the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*. And none shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*.\f + \fr 34.20 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

¶ \w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w work|strong="H5647"\w*, but on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*: in earing \w time|strong="H2758"\w* and in \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* thou shalt \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, and the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w ingathering|strong="H0614"\w* at the \w year’s|strong="H8141"\w* \w end|strong="H8622"\w*.\f + \fr 34.22 \ft year’s end: Heb. revolution of the year\f*

¶ \w Thrice|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* shall all your men \w children|strong="H2138"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For I will cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*: neither shall any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w desire|strong="H2530"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, when thou shalt go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w thrice|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w offer|strong="H7819"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of my \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* with \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*; neither shall the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* be \w left|strong="H3885"\w* unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

The \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt not \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w* in his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* thou these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: for after the \w tenor|strong="H6310"\w* of these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* I have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with thee and with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he was there with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*; he did neither \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. And he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* upon the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 34.28 \ft commandments: Heb. words\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* with the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* in \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, when he came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* not that the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w shone|strong="H7160"\w* while he \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with him.

And when \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, behold, the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w shone|strong="H7160"\w*; and they were \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* to come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* him.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto them; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and all the \w rulers|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto him: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with them.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w*: and he gave them in \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* with him in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

And \add till\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w done|strong="H3615"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* with them, he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w vail|strong="H4533"\w* on his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

But when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with him, he \w took|strong="H5493"\w* the \w vail|strong="H4533"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w*, until he came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. And he came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add that\add* which he was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, that the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w shone|strong="H7160"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* the \w vail|strong="H4533"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, until he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* in to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with him.
